levelList.name: Fell Bullet
levelList.desc:
Targets the ally with the least HP
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [Breath] for every [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
[EndSkill] Lose every [BoseProjektil]

coindescs.desc: This Coin deals damage only against the main target.
If the main target is an ally, deal +8% more damage for every [BoseProjektil] (max 56%)
[AllyKill] Apply 2 [Breath] to self and 2 allies
[AllyKillFail] Gain 1 [Breath]

This Coin deals damage only against the sub-targets
- If the first Coin failed to kill the ally, 1 random sub-target takes damage
+2% Damage on Critical Hit for every [BoseProjektil] (max 14%)
[CriticalOnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Laceration]
